original_text:
Our soul has had more than enough
    of the scorn of those who are at ease,
    of the contempt of the proud.
korean_text: 안일한 자의 조소와 교만한 자의 멸시가 우리 영혼에 넘치나이다

sentences.original_text: Our soul has had more than enough
of the scorn of those who are at ease
of the contempt of the proud
